• is_type_checking
  • PYENV_INSTALLED
  • ASDF_INSTALLED
  • PYENV_ROOT
  • ASDF_DATA_DIR
  • SYSTEM_ARCH
  • IS_64BIT_OS
  • IS_64BIT_OS
  • IGNORE_UNSUPPORTED
  • MYPY_RUNNING
  • SUBPROCESS_TIMEOUT
  • get_shim_paths
  • SHIM_PATHS
   1 # -*- coding=utf-8 -*-
   2 from __future__ import absolute_import, print_function
   3 
   4 import os
   5 import platform
   6 import sys
   7 
   8 
   9 def is_type_checking():
  10     try:
  11         from typing import TYPE_CHECKING
  12     except ImportError:
  13         return False
  14     return TYPE_CHECKING
  15 
  16 
  17 PYENV_INSTALLED = bool(os.environ.get("PYENV_SHELL")) or bool(
  18     os.environ.get("PYENV_ROOT")
  19 )
  20 ASDF_INSTALLED = bool(os.environ.get("ASDF_DIR"))
  21 PYENV_ROOT = os.path.expanduser(
  22     os.path.expandvars(os.environ.get("PYENV_ROOT", "~/.pyenv"))
  23 )
  24 ASDF_DATA_DIR = os.path.expanduser(
  25     os.path.expandvars(os.environ.get("ASDF_DATA_DIR", "~/.asdf"))
  26 )
  27 IS_64BIT_OS = None
  28 SYSTEM_ARCH = platform.architecture()[0]
  29 
  30 if sys.maxsize > 2 ** 32:
  31     IS_64BIT_OS = platform.machine() == "AMD64"
  32 else:
  33     IS_64BIT_OS = False
  34 
  35 
  36 IGNORE_UNSUPPORTED = bool(os.environ.get("PYTHONFINDER_IGNORE_UNSUPPORTED", False))
  37 MYPY_RUNNING = os.environ.get("MYPY_RUNNING", is_type_checking())
  38 SUBPROCESS_TIMEOUT = os.environ.get("PYTHONFINDER_SUBPROCESS_TIMEOUT", 5)
  39 """The default subprocess timeout for determining python versions
  40 
  41 Set to **5** by default.
  42 """
  43 
  44 
  45 def get_shim_paths():
  46     shim_paths = []
  47     if ASDF_INSTALLED:
  48         shim_paths.append(os.path.join(ASDF_DATA_DIR, "shims"))
  49     if PYENV_INSTALLED:
  50         shim_paths.append(os.path.join(PYENV_ROOT, "shims"))
  51     return [os.path.normpath(os.path.normcase(p)) for p in shim_paths]
  52 
  53 
  54 SHIM_PATHS = get_shim_paths()
